article_title: Taj Mahal Union Tells 3rd Circ. CBA Wrongly Axed In Ch. 11
article_text:
Taj Mahal Union Tells 3rd Circ. CBA Wrongly Axed In Ch. 11

Law360, Wilmington (February 13, 2015, 9:09 PM ET) -- The union representing over 1,000 Taj Mahal employees told the Third Circuit on Thursday that Trump Entertainment Resorts Inc. is misreading Chapter 11 law and the Delaware bankruptcy court never had the authority to allow the Atlantic City casino operator to discard its collective bargaining agreement with the workers.



In a reply brief before the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit, Unite Here Local 54 argued that the labor agreement with Trump Entertainment was already expired when the bankruptcy court was considering its rejection,...
